KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: The name of the first [path_corner](../path_corner) (where the train starts). The {{ entname }} is teleported to this position on map start, no matter whereit's placed.
Controls how to interpret use-types 'Off' and 'On' incoming from entity that triggers the {{ entname }}

keyChoices.choiceDescription: 'Off' and 'On' works as 'Toggle' so it will start the {{ entname }} when it's stopped and stop it when it's moving.
'Off' only stops and 'On' only starts the {{ entname }}.
